"%s requires you to add MIUI service framework to exceptions. You may receive notifications from MIUI's built-in apps and other third-party apps."
<u>SMSのテンプレートを調整する</u>
"アプリは画面と一緒にロックする"
今すぐ没入モードをオフにしますか？
通話を終了してもキャストは中断されません。電源ボタンを押して画面を閉じることができます。
"着信を除くすべての通知をオフにする"
"First spaceに切り替えてブロックリストを設定する"
"ウイルス定義が古くなっているようです。定期的な更新は、より良いスキャン結果を得るのに役立ちます。セキュリティにインターネットへの接続を許可してウイルス定義を更新しますか？"
"ウイルス定義が古くなっているようです。定期的な更新は、より良いスキャン結果を得るのに役立ちます。定義を更新してもう一度お試しください。"
"このアプリは安全ではないため、削除を推奨"
"このアプリはウイルスを含む可能性があるため、削除を推奨"
"Wi-Fiに接続されていません。モバイルデータを使用すると、追加の料金が発生する可能性があります。とにかく続行しますか？"
"アプリ名と詳細をアップロード"
"オンラインのウイルス定義を使用して、アプリ名と詳細をアップロードしてスキャンします。"
"この機能は暗号化した端末のIDをAvast、AVL、Tencentのサーバー(%s)にアップロードします。"
"セキュリティアプリはインターネット接続を制限されているため更新できません。セキュリティにインターネット接続を許可しますか？"
"ネットワークに接続できませんでした"
"携帯通信会社のAPN設定をテストする"
"バックグラウンドのネットワーク接続を制限すると、アプリが正常に動作しなくなる可能性があります(例：メッセージの受信やコンテンツの更新など)。"
Looks like there are no battery issues. Cool!

"Your device's hardware components or Android system version may cause compatibility issues and make some apps misbehave, freeze, or be force stopped. If you encounter such issues, share your feedback with the app developers."

"Your device's hardware components or Android system version may cause compatibility issues which may result in failing to install some apps. If you encounter such issues or some apps misbehave, freeze, or are being force stopped, ​wait until the app developers fix bugs and try installing the app again."
"%1$sが正常にインストールされました"
"アプリの自動起動を許可すると、RAMとバッテリーの追加リソースが必要になることがあります。とにかく許可しますか？"
"ファイル、設定、アカウント、データベース、キャッシュなどのすべてのアプリデータは完全に削除されます。"
"すべてのデータを削除しますか？"
"アプリのデータを削除できませんでした。"
"クリップボードにコピーしました"
You’ve chosen to launch this app by default for some actions.

"If you restrict Security's access to the internet and your location info, you won't be able to receive earthquake warnings, update virus definitions and blocklist info. Your device will become less secure. Restrict anyway?"
Welcome to Security! You can use this app to clear trash on your device, find and neutralize viruses, optimize performance for gaming, save battery, manage apps, and more.
Allow to connect to the internet and access location
"インターネット接続は正常です。"
"MIUI will set data limits and apps with unlimited data according to the carrier you select. If your carrier isn't listed, select \"Other\" and set up your daily data plan manually."
If your daily data plan contains a monthly data package, it will be used before the daily package.

Make sure you understand all the possible risks before you proceed. Activate device administrator for this app now?
"Diagnostics for %1$s is in progress. Wait until it's finished and try again."
"%1$s can't use mobile data when roaming. When you're roaming overseas, only apps you've added to exceptions can use mobile data."
Changing data plan type will reset all data usage settings (e.g. data limits) to their default values. Change data plan type now?
Some apps may incorrectly indicate that MIUI has prevented them from starting. Check permissions that have been granted to individual apps in Settings > Apps.

"About this feature: 1. Incoming calls to your data SIM won't interrupt mobile data connection. The connection will be interrupted only when you answer a call. 2. When this feature is turned on, the caller won't hear call waiting ringtones. Incoming calls will be ended unless you answer within 6 seconds. 3. This feature only works for data SIM cards. Calls to your primary SIM will interrupt mobile data connection. 4. This feature is supported only by China Mobile and China Unicom."

"Your device can't connect to the internet:
1. Make sure you haven't exceeded your mobile data plan's limit.
2. If you just topped up your device's balance, reboot your device and try again.
3. Your carrier's network signal may be weak in your current location."
"Couldn't activate SIM card. Make sure your SIM card is inserted properly and that your mobile plan has been activated by your carrier."
"Can't use mobile data to connect to the network"
"Can't use mobile data while roaming to connect to the network."

"There may be a problem with the router you're connected to: "1. Public WLAN network issues" If you're connected to a public WLAN network, the number of users connected to that network may be slowing it down or creating connectivity problems. Switch to another network and try again. "2. Internet service provider issues" Make sure that your account is in good standing with your Internet service provider. "3. Router hardware issues" Try rebooting your router or checking the admin settings for your router. "4. Other router issues" Read the instructions that came with your router and restore your router to its factory settings. "5. Make sure your router is connected properly" Try using another Ethernet cable to connect your router. If you suspect there's an issue with the connection in your home, contact your Internet service provider."

"There may be a problem with your SIM card:
1. Make sure your account is in good standing with your carrier. Try using a friend's SIM card and see if you're able to connect normally.
2. If you're using two SIM cards, try switching to the other card and see if you're able to connect normally.
3. Make sure your SIM card and your device's SIM slot aren't damaged. Confirm that the SIM card you're using is properly inserted in your device's SIM tray."
